hiveArticle.title: How many months you can survive without Job
hiveArticle.body:
#### How many months you can survive without Job
***
So with this Coronavirus affect, there will be a mass layoffs across the globe just like 2008. So if you are being laid off, for how many months you can survive with your savings?
***
 - 0
***
 - 3
***
 - 6
***
 - 9
***
 - 12
***
 - More than 12
***
*Answer the question at [dpoll.xyz](https://dpoll.xyz/detail/@codingdefined/how-many-months-you-can-survive-without-job/).*
